name: Robotic A.M.
description:
WELCOME ROBOTS

In Robotic A.M. you are robot miner maintaining a mining ship. Your goal is to get as deep as you can and obtain rare items in the anomaly.

You Lose By:

Losing your Engine
Running out of minerals
Losing your rare item cache
Losing all your mineral caches (and thus all minerals)

Controls: 

Keyboard

WASD - Move

E - Repair / Build

F- Switch what you are building

Controller:

Joystick - Move

X or button west - Repair/build

Y or button north - Switch Build

Hints:

Turrets use 1 mineral to shoot, if you build too many turrets too quickly you can lose when they shoot.

A  mineral cache spawns with 20 minerals but you will still lose if you go to 0 to build it

This was created for Ludum Dare 48 game jam
